title: Drake of Tanith
description: Eons ago, the darkly handsome and infamous bounty hunter Drake of Tanith turned his back on his diabolical heritage in favor of freedom from the infernal influences of his kind. But now his indomitable father has delivered the worst kind of ultimatum: He must give up his soul and return to the life he left behind â€“ or he must give up his love.In the ultimate race against time, Drake struggles to save both himself and the woman he cherishes from the razor-sharp clutches of the man he hates. Will he succeed in his battle against assassins, devils, and gods? Or will he lose to the one he despises the only thing he has ever held dear?Find out in book two in the Chosen Soul series by New York Times bestselling author, Heather Killough-Walden.The eyes of the Hunter are watching.
author: Heather Killough-Walden
